video.title: Inspector Morse
video.synopsis: Inspector Morse, intellectual, cynical and more than slightly snobbish, tackles the most devious crimes found in the diverse community of Oxford.

episodes.synopsis: Morse and Lewis investigate the apparent suicide of an attractive woman in her home.
episodes.title: The Dead of Jericho

episodes.synopsis: A web of corruption is uncovered after a deaf man is murdered overhearing a conversation at an Oxford college.
episodes.title: The Silent World of Nicholas Quinn

episodes.synopsis: Morse and Lewis investigate a murder in a quiet country church where a vicar and his volunteer helpers are the unlikely prime suspects.
episodes.title: Service of All the Dead

episodes.synopsis: A wealthy American tourist is found dead in her hotel -- a death that appears to be linked to the disappearance of a priceless Anglo-Saxon artifact.
episodes.title: The Wolvercote Tongue

episodes.synopsis: The daughter of a wealthy businessman has gone missing, and Morse confidently concludes the woman is dead.
episodes.title: Last Seen Wearing

episodes.synopsis: When a brutal murder disturbs the tranquillity of an Oxford college, Morse discovers that he has provided all the suspects with a watertight alibi.
episodes.title: The Settling of the Sun

episodes.synopsis: The death of a young woman in the car park of a pub on Woodstock Road presents a puzzle for Morse.
episodes.title: Last Bus to Woodstock

episodes.synopsis: Valuable erotic paintings are stolen from the stately home of Sir Julius Hanbury, who subsequently disappears.
episodes.title: The Ghost in the Machine

episodes.synopsis: A body is found in the canal and the only clue to its identity points to one of the colleges.
episodes.title: The Last Enemy

episodes.synopsis: Morse investigates the death of a member of the Clarets XI old boys' cricket team and realises that the players have more than cricket on their minds.
episodes.title: Deceived by Flight

episodes.synopsis: Morse and Lewis investigate a baffling murder in a car park where the only clues are a diary and a parking ticket.
episodes.title: The Secret of Bay 5B

episodes.synopsis: Morse and Lewis investigate the death of an eminent scientist, killed just before he was due to deliver a controversial speech.
episodes.title: Infernal Serpent

episodes.synopsis: The old-fashioned Radford Brewery is the subject of an unwelcome takeover bid by a huge corporation when the managing director is murdered.
episodes.title: The Sins of the Fathers

episodes.synopsis: Morse and Lewis have a serious difference of opinion over police procedure when they investigate the murder of a young woman.
episodes.title: Driven to Distraction

episodes.synopsis: Morse is viciously harassed by an unknown tormentor and finds himself a suspect after a lady friend is knifed to death during a rehearsal.
episodes.title: Masonic Mysteries

episodes.synopsis: Morse investigates the murder of an ex-deputy police commissioner.
episodes.title: Second Time Around

episodes.synopsis: Morse finds romance in an unlikely setting as he investigates the suspicious death of a woman deacon.
episodes.title: Fat Chance

episodes.synopsis: Investigating the mysterious death of an artist, Morse discovers that the fun-loving drinker was not the lovable rogue he appeared to be.
episodes.title: Who Killed Harry Field?

episodes.synopsis: Morse and Lewis face a language barrier when they investigate a murder in Oxford's Greek community.
episodes.title: Greeks Bearing Gifts

episodes.synopsis: Morse and Lewis's search for an ex-informant takes them from the dreaming spires of Oxford to the rough-and-ready outback of Australia.
episodes.title: Promised Land

episodes.synopsis: Morse is haunted by his past when he investigates the apparent suicide of a terminally ill Oxford don.
episodes.title: Dead on Time

episodes.synopsis: When a business tycoon is murdered at his country mansion, his wife and sons fall under suspicion.
episodes.title: Happy Families

episodes.synopsis: The death of an Englishwoman abroad takes Morse and Lewis to the vineyards of Italy, where Morse is captivated by a glamorous opera singer.
episodes.title: The Death of the Self

episodes.synopsis: The sudden death of a convict leads Inspector Morse and Sgt. Lewis to investigate the complex affairs of three businessmen jailed for fraud.
episodes.title: Absolute Conviction

episodes.synopsis: When tragedy strikes in his own family, Morse's investigation into the death of a bright young girl leads him into an alien world of raves and drugs.
episodes.title: Cherubim and Seraphim

episodes.synopsis: Morse investigates when the founder of a private hospital is found dead. The father of one of the victim's patients is the prime suspect.
episodes.title: Deadly Slumber

episodes.synopsis: Morse and Lewis find themselves in a terrifying world of devil worship as they hunt a violent rapist on the run from prison.
episodes.title: The Day of the Devil

episodes.synopsis: Morse's investigation into a shocking act of violence at an Oxford degree ceremony uncovers some secrets involving a world-famous opera singer.
episodes.title: Twilight of the Gods

episodes.synopsis: Morse and Lewis investigate a murder case believed closed after the accused's death as there is still a body to be accounted for.
episodes.title: The Way Through the Woods

episodes.synopsis: Chief Inspector Morse and Sgt. Lewis investigate the murders of two men in Oxford, but the suspects seem to have perfect alibis.
episodes.title: The Daughters of Cain

episodes.synopsis: Investigations unearth links between two murders and take Morse into the hothouse atmosphere of the election for the Master of Lonsdale College.
episodes.title: Death Is Now My Neighbour

episodes.synopsis: Morse investigates a murder that takes him away from the familiar setting of 20th-century Oxford to solving a canal murder in Oxford in 1859.
episodes.title: The Wench is Dead

episodes.synopsis: The yearlong investigation into the murder of Yvonne Harrison in a quiet Cotswold village is revitalised with the promise of new evidence.
episodes.title: The Remorseful Day
